title: Pune School Principal Assaulted by Mob Raising Hindutva Slogans
selftext:
Few days back , it was reported that the principal was assaulted because he had installed CCTV in girls toilets and was then blackmailing the girls to convert to Christianity.


WELL, THAT WAS A LIE.
comments: That much anyone with functioning braincells could have guessed. I honestly don't know what's the end goal here for such hardliners.
Bloody cowards attacking an innocent man, when our wives and daughter are harassed where are the people
